message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. I believe it would be incredibly valuable to you, given its features and benefits.  I'm initially offering it at $11,500. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me there?
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $10,500 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to compromise some, how about $11,000? This product truly is valuable and I wouldn't want you to miss out.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,250?
Bob, I'm seeing we're getting closer.  I can tell this product would be a great asset for you. How about we split the difference and settle at $10,625?
I appreciate the offer, but I think we can do a bit better than that. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,500?
